document_info.title: DMT-Nexus Extraction Teks Compilation
document_info.purpose: Reference material for understanding botanical extraction principles applicable to oilahuasca herb preparations
document_info.disclaimer: Educational reference only. These teks describe ayahuasca/DMT extraction methods which share extraction chemistry principles with oilahuasca preparations.

q21q21_vinegar_lime_tek.title: Q21Q21's Vinegar/Lime A/B Extraction Tek
q21q21_vinegar_lime_tek.attribution: Compilation of many people's ideas including Blueskine, Noman, 69ron, amor_fati, SyZyGyPSy
q21q21_vinegar_lime_tek.note: Q21Q21 being a fictional alien entity... with internet access

forms_of_dmt.jungle_dmt: Red/dark colored full spectrum - approximately 95% DMT with other compounds
forms_of_dmt.dmt_n_oxide: Yellow colored - approximately 1/3 potency of white DMT when smoked
forms_of_dmt.jimjam: Full spectrum product containing all alkaloids - 1-2% of MHRB weight

tek_1_jimjam_party.description: Uses xylene or d-limonene - yields full spectrum Jimjam DMT
tek_1_jimjam_party.food_safe_note: If d-limonene is used, the tek is 100% food-safe

materials.mhrb: 30g or more powdered Mimosa hostilis root bark
materials.containers: HDPE2 plastic, glass, or metal - solvent resistant

acidification_step.purpose: Vinegar (acetic acid) converts DMT-tannate to DMT-acetate and dissolves into surrounding vinegar
procedure: Place 30-250g powdered MHRB in container
Add vinegar until bark is wet, red and clumpy
Slowly add near-boiling water while stirring until mixture flows when tipped
Let sit 20-40 minutes, stirring periodically

basification_step.purpose: Lime converts polar DMT-acetate to non-polar DMT freebase
basification_step.critical_note: MUST use Calcium Hydroxide or tek will not work
basification_step.lime_ratio: At least 3g lime per 4g MHRB (75g for 100g MHRB)

consistency_options.dry_crumbly: Least solvent loss but may not fully penetrate chunks
consistency_options.thick_porridge: Easiest to work with, greatest solvent loss
consistency_options.tomato_soup: Medium solvent loss, can form emulsions

timing_recommendations.first_pull: 6-8 hours after lime - gets 30-50% of total DMT
timing_recommendations.fifth_pull: 2-3 weeks - all 5 pulls get 95%+ of total DMT

pulling_with_solvent.solvent_loss_note: Losing 50-100ml during a pull is common - necessary evil

salting_with_vinegar.purpose: Converts DMT-freebase back to water-soluble DMT-acetate
procedure: Add 2 shot glasses of vinegar to solvent in sealable container
Agitate using doorknob-turning method 3-4 times over 40-60 minutes
Use turkey baster to separate vinegar (bottom layer)
Repeat with fresh vinegar
Combine all vinegar pulls
Filter vinegar through cotton ball into pot
Boil down to ~40-50ml
Lower heat to medium-low, watch until red color develops
Transfer to dropper bottle before all liquid evaporates

smoking_method.material: Pre-charred copper kitchen scrubber ball (2cm x 2cm rolled to 1cm)
smoking_method.evaporation: Slow method - let drops dry on material; Quick method - heat on glass/spoon
smoking_method.device: The Machine - copper mesh in any bowl/pipe/bong
smoking_method.stability_warning: DMT-acetate unstable outside tincture - store pre-dosed balls in freezer

tek_2_fluffy_white_funfest.description: Uses naphtha - yields white DMT crystals via freezer precipitation

recommended_brands.canada: Ronsonol Lighter Fluid or Escort Camp Fuel

naphtha_safety.test: Evaporate on surface - should leave no residue or smell

unique_steps.heating: Must warm naphtha to dissolve DMT
unique_steps.water_bath: Place bark container in bowl of boiling water
unique_steps.freezer_precipitation: Cool naphtha causes DMT crystals to form

procedure: Place warm naphtha with dissolved DMT in freezer
Crystals form over 8-12 hours
Naphtha becomes cloudy then clears as crystals form
Gently pour off naphtha back to bark
Let remaining naphtha evaporate
precipitation.crystal_notes: Later pulls yield more yellow crystals - no difference in effects

steps: Mix vinegar with MHRB until wet/red/muddy, add boiling water until flows
Add 75g+ lime per 100g MHRB, mix thoroughly
Let sit 1-6 hours, add 150ml+ d-limonene/xylene per 100g MHRB
Stir periodically 40-50 minutes, pour off solvent
Add 2 shot-glasses vinegar, agitate 40-50 minutes, separate vinegar
Repeat vinegar step, evaporate combined vinegar until red
Transfer to dropper bottle - smokeable DMT tincture
Mix vinegar with MHRB, add boiling water until flows
Add 75g+ lime per 100g MHRB, let sit 1-6 hours
Warm bark in water bath, add 100ml naphtha per 100g MHRB
Stir 40-50 minutes keeping warm, pour naphtha to freezer container
Freeze 8-12 hours until crystals form
Pour off naphtha, let crystals dry - ready to smoke

common_failures: Lime is not Calcium Hydroxide - pH not high enough
Wrong solvent - no dissolution or precipitation
Not real MHRB - no DMT to extract
MHRB not powdered - 5% yield vs powdered
Vinegar not 5% acetic acid - makes tek 5x slower

llb_instant_ayahuasca_tek.title: Instant Ayahuasca Little Lightning Bolt TEK
llb_instant_ayahuasca_tek.philosophy: Based in ancient herbalism - simple as production of any herbal extract

procedure: Add ethanol to MHRB - enough to cover with 1 inch above plant matter
Separate container for caapi/ethanol
Soak 2-4 weeks
Strain and separate menstrum from plant matter
Evaporate in pyrex baking pans in open oven with fan
Crystals form - puffy cake-like foam that becomes sticky when cooled
Harvest with razor blade, store in dry place

methods: Dissolved in warm water like instant coffee
ingestion.no_difference_noted: Caps vs warm water made no difference in absorption/onset/duration

experience_report.trigger: Eating sourdough bread brought on effects within 15-20 minutes
experience_report.quality: Crystal clear experience - most educational with ayahuasca
effects: Heart opened, light between group members
Entity contact - snake spirit teaching unity
Clear head, able to witness disturbing feelings without over-identifying
experience_report.comparison: Better than brews made by Amazonian shamans which can cloud mind and create fear

suggestions.fasting: Eat breakfast and light lunch, no dinner
suggestions.bread_timing: 20-30 minutes after ingestion, eat sourdough slices
suggestions.cacao_idea: Consider cacao nibs prior for theobromine potentiation of tryptamines

llb_instant_ayahuasca_tek.ethanol_note: Easy Still recommended for producing high-proof ethanol from sugar and yeast

other_plants.chacruna: Produces bright green oil - less strong than MHRB but visionary

acid_base_extraction_overview.title: Acid/Base Extraction Overview
acid_base_extraction_overview.principle: Uses weak acid (citric, acetic) to extract DMT into solution, then basify and pull with non-polar solvent
advantages: Generally yields product more devoid of botanical impurities

materials.base: 4 tablespoons (50g) sodium hydroxide in 1 pint hot water

steps: Grind bark to 2-inch pieces in glass-topped blender
Cook in crockpot with vinegar-water solution on high for 2 hours
Pour off liquid, repeat with remaining solution
Let particles settle overnight
Pour off clear liquid, discard sludge
Add premixed lye solution to wine jug
Gently mix for 1 minute
Pull with solvent of choice

herbal_percolator_method.title: The Herbal Percolator (THP)
herbal_percolator_method.creator: Dagger
herbal_percolator_method.principle: Similar to coffee brewing - percolation without cooking
advantages: Results at least double potency compared to 3x3 hour cooking (with caapi)
Less nauseating - low temperature prevents extraction of nauseating compounds
construction: Cut off bottom of soda bottle
Stuff cotton into neck (not too tight)
Add powdered herb on top of cotton
Push cloth down to press against herbs
Place bottle neck-down into collection jar
Put cloth between bottle and jar for air release
procedure: Add warm water (~60C/140F) - not too hot or plastic buckles
Add acid: 15-30ml 5% vinegar per litre of water
Keep adding water at regular intervals as it drips through
Reduce collected liquid

water_ratios.caapi: 1g:150ml or more - more water = better extraction

plant_effectiveness.viridis: Jury still out - apparently requires hotter water

nausea_reduction.mechanism: Low temperature prevents extraction of nauseating compounds
nausea_reduction.compounds_avoided: Those making brew brownish when cold, clear when hot
nausea_reduction.for_nausea_prone: Try cooler water, but use more of it

shaggys_jungle_tek.title: Shaggy's Jungle Tek
shaggys_jungle_tek.principle: A/B extraction using citric acid then sodium hydroxide, pulling with toluene to get full-spectrum (white DMT + Yuremamine)

overview.acid_step: Citric acid extracts alkaloids into aqueous solution
overview.base_step: Sodium hydroxide breaks down cell walls and converts alkaloids to freebase
overview.solvent_step: Toluene pulls both DMT (white) and Yuremamine (red)
overview.separation: Heptane wash separates white DMT from red Jungle Spice

acid_cook: Dissolve 30g citric acid in gallon distilled water in crockpot
Boil on high 6-8 hours, stirring regularly
Let cool and steam to reduce volume
basification: Dissolve 200g NaOH in 250ml warm water (exothermic - careful)

procedure: Cap jug, gently invert 10 minutes mixing without foam
Let layers separate
Siphon off toluene to mason jar
Repeat 3+ more times until toluene pulls lighter colored
nonpolar_extraction.warning: NEVER suck up dark bottom layer - toxic

methods: Large pyrex pan outside with electric fan
Heat to 300F until smells of DMT not solvent
evaporation.result: Reddish yellow oil that hardens when scraped and cooled

procedure: Fill test tube half with extract, half with acetone
Hot water bath until acetone bubbles
Shake, let settle, siphon acetone to hot pyrex
Repeat until all extract dissolved
acetone_wash.result: Orange deemsters - full spectrum Mimosa extract

alkaloid_separation.important: NO TOLUENE in this step - use clean pipettes/containers
procedure: Heat heptane in crockpot
Melt extract in test tube in crockpot
Add hot heptane, mix forcefully with pipette
Keep hot - white DMT falls back into red if cooled
Quickly siphon heptane to pyrex dish
Repeat 3 times

lazymans_tek.title: Lazyman's Tek - STB (Straight to Base)
lazymans_tek.philosophy: Simplest tek - no acid step, no pH papers, no separatory funnel
advantages: Far less time and work than A/B teks
No need to powder bark - just break into pieces
Can continue extracting same material indefinitely
Higher yields reported than A/B methods
lazymans_tek.basic_principle: Submerge broken bark in NaOH water, wait, add naphtha, stir, pour off

preparation: Break bark into 2-inch pieces - no powdering needed
extraction: Wait 1 hour for NaOH to soften bark
Let settle, pour naphtha to evap dish

lazy_method.procedure: Add 500g bark + 200g NaOH + 2L water + 750ml naphtha. Set aside 3 days, stir once daily 20 min. Single pull gets 2/3 of total alkaloid.
lazy_method.note: Still need 3+ more pulls after to get remainder

temperature_notes.recommendation: Room temp for 72+ hours, warm to 120F for 1 hour before final pull

dry_defat.principle: Alkaloid already in salt form - naphtha alone extracts nothing without basification
dry_defat.procedure: Mix dry powder in naphtha 5 min, strain, repeat 3x, discard naphtha
dry_defat.note: Orange fats extracted - may contain oral-activating compound

hippie_salad_oil_tek.title: Hippie Salad Oil Tek
hippie_salad_oil_tek.philosophy: 100% food-safe tek using only culinary ingredients
key_features: Uses vegetable oil (sunflower) instead of hydrocarbon solvents

vinegar_step.jamie_note: Started with vinegar acid step like Q21 - helps solvent pulls
vinegar_step.dreamer_note: Vinegar step is redundant - just increases base needed
vinegar_step.consistency: Want VERY thick paste before adding oil - cookie dough consistency

with_vinegar: Mix MHRB with vinegar until wet/red/thick
Add sunflower oil, stir to separate
Pull oil, salt with vinegar to extract DMT
without_vinegar: Mix MHRB with lime and minimal water

tips.separation: If too liquid, takes 2-3 days to separate - keep thick
tips.heat: Hot pulls (double boiler) more efficient but pull more junk
tips.pulls: 9 pulls may be redundant - oil less efficient than other solvents

shared_principles: Enzyme modulation (MAO in ayahuasca, CYP450 in oilahuasca)
relevance_to_oilahuasca.key_difference: Ayahuasca uses MAO inhibition; Oilahuasca uses CYP450 modulation
relevance_to_oilahuasca.extraction_applicability: These teks demonstrate botanical extraction principles that could apply to preparing oilahuasca herb extracts and tinctures
relevance_to_oilahuasca.hippie_oil_tek_relevance: The food-safe approach using vegetable oil is particularly relevant to oilahuasca preparations which emphasize culinary-grade ingredients
